author: aheritier
msg: MAVEN-1733 : set maven.compile.fork=true. It seems to reduce the number of times when the bootstrap fails because it can't delete a directory. It's a known problem in java and ant : See the windows note on http://ant.apache.org/manual/CoreTasks/javac.html

author: aheritier
msg: MAVEN-1733 : set maven.compile.fork=true. It seems to reduce the number of times when the bootstrap fails because it can't delete a directory. It's a known problem in java and ant : See the windows note on http://ant.apache.org/manual/CoreTasks/javac.html
